mapper.insert: insert into student_practice (student_id, practice_id, role, duration, performance_score, evaluation, certificate_url, status, apply_time, apply_remark, created_time, updated_time) values (#{studentId}, #{practiceId}, #{role}, #{duration}, #{performanceScore}, #{evaluation}, #{certificateUrl}, #{status}, ifnull(#{applyTime}, now()), #{applyRemark}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select sp.*, s.student_no, s.name as student_name, p.practice_name, p.practice_type, p.organizer from student_practice sp left join student s on sp.student_id = s.student_id left join social_practice p on sp.practice_id = p.practice_id where sp.record_id = #{recordId}

select sp.record_id, sp.student_id, s.name as student_name, p.practice_name from student_practice sp left join student s on sp.student_id = s.student_id left join social_practice p on sp.practice_id = p.practice_id order by sp.created_time desc

select sp.record_id, sp.student_id, s.student_no, s.name as student_name, sp.practice_id, p.practice_name, p.practice_type, p.organizer, sp.role, sp.duration, sp.performance_score, sp.status, sp.evaluation from student_practice sp left join student s on sp.student_id = s.student_id left join social_practice p on sp.practice_id = p.practice_id where sp.student_id = #{studentId} order by sp.created_time desc
